website_summaries.verdict: Fashion-forward with moderate support, this feminine sandal transitions from everyday wear to special occasions with ease.
pros: More structure and support than standard flip-flop
Synthetic upper, cushioned footbed, synthetic outsole
cons: A few report these sandals make funny noises when they walk, especially if wet
Some say they do not fit wide feet

customer_reviews.title: Broke After a Month
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, however, I only have been wearing them for about a month and the strap broke off the back of one of them... I guess the material is glued together, and it's not very strong. I love these shoes but I have to say I'm not impressed with the quality of how they're made.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great for plantar fasciitis/Hair Stylist
customer_reviews.text: My plantar fasciitis has flared up and I had been doing hours of research trying to find cute comfy and supportive shoes because I am a hairdresser and stand on my feet all day. I'm on day two and my feet haven't felt better . These have been amazing. I was going to send them back bc I have a very high arch and they looked so flat. But with my insoles they are even more comfortable!!! They are sooooooooo AMAZING!!! I went up a half size. I usually wear a 8 1/2 but since I had read about the thong part hurting I got the size 9. But them now!!!
customer_reviews.author: Emily L.

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with these shoes!!! I say they fit some what small only because I usually wear a nine and these are an exact fit. No room for error. They are extremely comfortable as crocs normally are. Perfectly cute and will do great for my plantar facitis. I want them in more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Hayes Angel

customer_reviews.title: All day and night comfort!
customer_reviews.text: I love these so much I just bought a second pair! I wear a 9 normally so I bought a 9 in these and they are perfect! I was born with fugly feet, so I don't usually wear such revealing shoes. I'm to the age now (34) that I just don't care about my crooked toes anymore. We just got back from a family vacation where I wore these all day every day. No complaints, no blisters, they were super comfy! I LOVE them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Florida teacher mom

customer_reviews.title: dressy and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 9 and 9.5 in flats/Toms, ordered the 9 they fit perfectly. These shoes are on the narrow side my foot come right to the edge. Easy to put on. Very comfortable! Its so hard to find comfy and cute women's shoes. The color is very shiny gold in the light.
customer_reviews.author: Engeliking

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile sandal, but size DOWN
customer_reviews.text: I love this sandal! I bought them for a beach vacation and they worked great for going to the beach/pool since they're waterproof but also looked nice enough to wear with a dress to dinner. Very versatile. I brought 4 other pairs of shoes but ended up wearing these ones for the whole trip. Be advised that these run big though. I'm usually 8.5 so I bought an 8 but they were too big. Returned them for a size 7 which fit better.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine K

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Cute
customer_reviews.text: So comfy!! I love crocs. They fit well, they are comfy, and they are cute. With Crocs I order a size 7 because I feel Crocs run a bit big. I’m anywhere between 7.5 and 8 with other shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sandals for stubborn feet.
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this sandal. The color is pearl opaque, and matches with everything. I have plantar fasciitis and its practically impossible for me to find cute, comfortable sandals that do not have an orthopedic look. My foot is medium sized and im a size 6.5 or 7 in sandals. I went with the 7 since crocs do not have 1/2 sizes. They fit perfect. I can walk all day in these and feel no pain whatsoever. I was so happy with them that i ordered them in black. Ive gotten many compliments and some suprised looks when i mention they are crocs.
customer_reviews.author: AEG

customer_reviews.title: Update- 2 months later
customer_reviews.text: I'm soooo surprised by how much I like these sandals! The footbed is SO SQUISHY and supportive- it's like walking on a memory foam carpet all day. The black ones are neutral enough to wear to work! I will be buying at least 1 other pair of these for this summer. No rubbing, itching, or irritation from the rubbery material. Update: two months after purchase: TERRIBLE quality! The backs are just glued together. After light wear over a 2 month period, one of the sandals snapped. I'm very disappointed in the quality and will not be purchasing Crocs sandals again.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Hesitant buyer -  but happy!
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid to purchase these because they are Crocs and the stigma of the brand over the years. I have to say so far I am very happy with these! They are cute, different than the traditional flip flop and have a slight "cushion" which is interesting sense they appear to be made of plastic. I like that they have the backs so that my feet stay in them while walking or going on amusement rides. My only complaint so far is that I wish they were slightly wider. They fit true to size for me (US 7). They are surprisingly comfortable, and I will get different styles and colors!
customer_reviews.author: Lemhi

customer_reviews.title: Might want to size up in these
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping to like these sandals. I ordered a 7, which I’m usually a solid 7. I wish I returned them for a larger size. The next size is an 8 (7 1/2 would probably be perfect). I thought I could pull off wearing the 7s, and went for a short walk in my neighborhood. They were comfortable but are just a tad too small and ended up almost giving me blisters. I will wear them more for casual wear not to walk far in.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Painful!!!  (between the toes and the heel)
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and a nice alternative to flip-flops (so I thought), but they are extremely uncomfortable for even a small amount of walking; they are very painful between the toes and also cut into the back of my heels. I have 99 cent flip flops that are much more comfortable to walk in than these. The size is correct and my foot is medium width, so that wasn't the issue. Briefly scanning some other negative reviews it looks like perhaps these used to be made with a slightly different material and more comfortable back then. Never bought Crocs before -- this is a turn-off for the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: my2cents

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of CROCs sandals and I love them they are the most comfortable. I saw these - which were the same material just a different design and bought them. These sandals are just as comfy. I love them cause they can get wet and dry out quickly - perfect for beach, pool, or lake time!! I have an 8 in the other shoe and ordered an 8 in this style and it fit the same
customer_reviews.author: Summer Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Breaks too easy
customer_reviews.text: I only wore them 3x, and they broke. I would otherwise have provided a glowing review, but they suck. It was just past the return window too as I bought them out of season. I do not recommend this product at all. I was not rough on them, I didn't even wear them whole days just a couple hours each time, and the strap broke on the side of the ankle- not anywhere you'd naturally stress it from too small of shoes or anything like that. The quality just isn't there, the straps are brittle.
customer_reviews.author: Pamcakes

customer_reviews.title: anyway 6 was size was ok but t strap was very painful.. so returned them
customer_reviews.text: Giving 1 star...crocs don't have 1/2 sizes thus order both sizes ..my size is 61/2 ..thus order 6 and 7 both..as crocs website mention half sizes need to go for 1 size lower sizes..anyway 6 was size was ok but t strap was very painful..so returned them..kept size 7..well did a huge mistake ..just few hrs I had those sandals walked few blocks..came back home with horrible painful feet..my both feet were sore , ..as no support at all..sorry to say that pain was stay with me few days..would suggest for not go for looks ..u will be regret ..its not comfortable at all..i have wasted my money ..
customer_reviews.author: FAIR

customer_reviews.title: It's a Croc!
customer_reviews.text: My foot hurt and started swelling, and my doc wasn't helping. I needed shoes I could wear without pain. I opted for a supportive flip flop (in case of swells). Who knew I could find it in a Croc? Supportive. Comfortable. Cute. Even my podiatrist's nurses were remarking, "What? This is a Croc? I need some." I know. Where have they been hiding? Of course, it'll cut at the toe joint, because you also have the heel support. But with the jelly material, it works.
customer_reviews.author: D-Educator

customer_reviews.title: Love these sandals
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. The first pair I used every warm day and then some for the past two years. So comfortable. Spent a week wali g around Disney world- that’s when I fell in love with them. Great for being on your feet all day. Very comfortable especially around the heels of your foot. I used to be a Shoe size 8 but after my child was born my feet gained a half size. However, even though I need an 8 1/2 show I order these in a size 8 and they fit great. I love them & will start buying them in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: The Family

customer_reviews.title: I read such good reviews about these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I read such good reviews about these shoes... I wore them one time and in my 20 min. walk had to go to the closest store and buy ANYTHING ELSE to put on my feet. Spent 13.00 at a CVS to find slip-on shoes because I could not walk in them anymore. The strap between the toe killed my foot. At home... I thought they were great... BUT actually walking they are awful. So disappointed with this purchase. Not to mention the back was already coming​ apart detaching from the shoe...
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Walters

customer_reviews.title: My third pair!
customer_reviews.text: I figured it’s time I wrote a review considering this is my third time buying this shoe! I find it to be super comfortable, but I always forget there’s a little bit of a “break in”. The thong feels a little snug at first but loosened up nicely, never painful. Each pair lasted me about about 1.5-2 years each. But I love it, love it, love it. It just disappears on your foot, looking almost barefoot, I’m caramel complexion and the color works although they should also consider a darker shade. I love knowing I have a great basic that can easily be replaced. Please continue to make this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pair I have purchased because I wear them every day. They are my favorite shoes! I had my first pair when I was pregnant and they offered great support, comfort, and grip on wet surfaces (it rains a lot where I live). I wore through those in a little over a year and got a second pair. Now I am back to work teaching and on my feet all day and I am on my third pair and they are still my favorite shoe! Don’t worry, the wearing out of the sole is because I literally wear them every day all day!
customer_reviews.author: A. Davis

customer_reviews.title: COMFORTABLE AND CUTE.
customer_reviews.text: These literally have become my FAVORITE footwear item. I wear them everywhere. My friends can't believe it when I say they're Crocs. I came across these looking for a cute shoe that would last me all day during events. Now I wear them all the time and have repurchased the same tan color and a black pair for variety. I think the tan gives off a less plastic-y vibe, but honestly, for how long I could live in these shoes, I don't care about the plastic look. They are COMFORT and STYLE (well, style enough). You can dress them up or wear them casually. I cannot stress enough, they are great. 👏
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly comfort
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased my first pair of crocs sandals and I'm pretty obsessed now. I am extremely picky about shoes and mainly focus on comfort but also style. I have high arches and always seek shoes that provide adequate comfort. these shoes are cute, stylish and extremely comfortable. after purchasing the black ones from Amazon I purchased the aqua pair. Although they are both extremely heavenly comfortable I feel like the black thong sandals provide the most comfort since your foot is not sustained by the outter parts of the sandals. I cant believe I hadn't been a fan of these before.
customer_reviews.author: Flygirlatheart

customer_reviews.title: More narrow than other Crocs
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes, but they are more narrow than other Crocs sandals. My feet are somewhat wide and, although they were very comfortable, they did not look right as my feet were hanging over the edge so I am returning them. The sexi line fits me much better. These would be good for a narrow foot.
customer_reviews.author: Here is my honest opinion

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: So, so happy with this purchase! I've never been a fan of crocs due to their style, although I know crocs are known for their comfort. I wanted to purchase comfortable sandals for a trip where I know I would be doing lots of walking. I have flat feet. So arch support is necessary. When I saw these sandals, I thought I'd give them a shot. These were beyond my expectations! They are lightweight, comfortable, true to size and a great price! Will purchase again and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Sepulveda

customer_reviews.title: The back strap on the back did breakaway from the sole of the shoe but I melted both with a lighter and pressed them back together and it's been fine since. I get complements and shock when I ...
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear an 9.5 but in crocs I get a 9, and these fit perfectly. The back strap on the back did breakaway from the sole of the shoe but I melted both with a lighter and pressed them back together and it's been fine since. I get complements and shock when I tell people they're crocs. And most importantly, they are very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: ng

customer_reviews.title: Runs large
customer_reviews.text: These run very large. In the picture, I have a size 9 (my normal size) on my left foot, and a size 8 on my right. You can see that the 9 is way longer than my foot, and the straps are really loose. I felt like I might break my ankle just trying them out in my house. The 8 fits much better, although I do wish the sole were bigger, and the straps can be a bit tight depending on how my foot is positioned. Naturally, they don't have these in half sizes! That being said, these are pretty comfortable, even for not being a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: amazoncustomer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and comfortable! I love these sandals because of versatile and comfortable they are. I've worn them to the beach, out for dinner, to work, you name it! So comfortable! Crocs advice on sizing for this style is if you are between sizes order down . I wear 8.5 and got the 8 and they fit perfectly. what I also like is that you can rinse them off should they get a little sweaty and dirty which sandals tend to get. I've put soap on them and washed them in the tub and they were good as new. I bought 3 others colors and will be buying another black pair
customer_reviews.author: v

customer_reviews.title: May need to try a couple sizes
customer_reviews.text: I typically wear a 6.5, and ordered both the size 6 & 7 - the 6 was a little too snug, but the 7 seemed just right. My foot is on the narrow size, so the bed fit well. They are much more narrow than traditional Crocs, so be prepared for that. These sandals were super comfortable & I was able to wear them 10k steps a day out of the box. I enjoyed them for a trip to Disney, and often wore them for 1/2 the day.
customer_reviews.author: SMHermm

customer_reviews.title: BUY THEM!
customer_reviews.text: These are a no-brainer... I've worn them non stop since buying them. I wear them to work, to go walking, to go to Cyclebar, to go out on the town, everywhere! They match everything, are light as a feather, and provide amazing support. They are by far my most comfortable shoes. Stop looking and just buy! I'm usually a 7.5 in sandals and the 7 in these fit perfectly. Excuse the need for a pedicure in my pics... and the dark spot on my foot is an ill-conceived tattoo that I cover up with make up everyday... lol
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Oliver

customer_reviews.title: After Bunion Surgery ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a 46 year old woman that had a bunionectomy two years ago. Since then, crocs have been my savior. After the surgery, going barefoot wasn't really for me anymore, and crocs have been my everything. My house shoes, my work shoes, my *everything*. I came here specifically to write about these in particular, as I just can't get enough. You may think they are thinner than the normal croc shoes and won't be as comfortable, but it is just not true. These are simply perfect for me, and I am IN LOVE with these shoes! If you've got some foot issues, do not hesitate, buy these immediately!
customer_reviews.author: JenKozzie

customer_reviews.title: Ugly as hell but SO comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Let me be clear. I absolutely hate this style and I would have never bought these if I didn't need them for work. I'm on my feet constantly and it's always hot. So i needed something comfy and cool. These are the best sandals I could have gotten myself. My god they're ugly, i hate the way they look. But they're SO comfortable. I can't justify taking stars off for looks because that's just a preference. Really ugly. But it's ok because they've saved my life at work.
customer_reviews.author: Joana

customer_reviews.title: The perfect summer sandal
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals! This is my second time buying them. I had the first pair for two years and with constant use over spring and summer and running around with three kids they just got a little bit worn down. I've received numerous compliments on them every time I wear them. They are great for going on short walks around the neighborhood, or wearing to the pool or beach. I've even worn them with dresses.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pool
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter, but unfortunately, they were too small and went back. That was my fault as I probably should have ordered up but I'm not used to buying women's sizes for her. She wears a 4.5 kids and I ordered a 6 women's. I have a pair myself and love them for wearing on rainy days and to the pool. You wouldn't want to walk long distances in them as they don't have a lot of support, but they are a nice alternative to thin flip flops.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never been a crocs fan, purely based on the way they look but these are super cute. They fit true to size and form to your foot well. The only thing is they are very slick on certain surfaces so you have to be careful you don’t go ice-skating while wearing these shoes. If they made these shoes in a wider array of colors I’m sure I would buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cute
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have ever purchased a product for myself from Crocs. I love to take walk breaks at work but my feet get so sore when I wear "fashion" type of sandals (which means no support). I thought I'd try these and my feet feel just as good in them walking as they would if I were in true walking shoes. I also have spent an entire day walking a zoo with my family and my feet never bothered me. I love that I can wear sandals in hot weather and still be comfortable doing a lot of walking. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda GB

customer_reviews.title: Not as narrow as reviews claim...
customer_reviews.text: Cute and as comfy as any other crocs. I'm in between sizes, and for me I like to go a size up with most crocs EXCEPT SANDALS. For some reason, many of the crocs sandals seem to be loose and floppy on my feet when I go the size up. I only ordered the size up this time because many reviews claimed these specific sandals are smaller than most crocs sandals. This is not true! If you're familiar with how crocs fit, go with the size you like and don't listen to the reviews here. They're definitely misleading. Other than that... I think these shoes are awesome! So, 5 stars for the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: These are the best shoes I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I have worn them two complete summers in a row. I travel for a living and wind up in Hawaii frequently, and these are the only shoes I pack -- you can safely bike, swim, walk, get wet and sandy, dress up for dinner, and they are lightweight, dont blister, pack great, and stay close to your foot (they aren't loose)! These allow you to be active and go from activity to activity without having to think. I keep buying extras in case Amazon quits selling them.
customer_reviews.author: chica30

customer_reviews.title: Narrow and too small 11 guys like 10
customer_reviews.text: The hole to put your foot in is bigger than I expected and feels loose on my foot, the shoe is also smaller, so much so I will have to return. I always wear a size 11 in all shoes and I ordered two size 11 one in the style and one in another style and they are both too small. This style is more narrow than the other style I ordered, which I also was not a fan of; and I do not have wide feet I have long skinny feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: The most versatile sandal you’ll ever own.
customer_reviews.text: I say “fits as expected” because this is my fourth pair but plan to go down half a size because I normally wear a 6 1/2 to a 7. If you know your normal crocs size, use that. These things are super comfy and look cute with jeans, shorts, and casual skirts. I also frequently wear them with dress pants in the office (in Florida) because they can dress an outfit up or down. This is my 2nd pair of black because I wore the other ones out. I have two other colors too! If they get dirty, I walk right in the shower with them!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: So comfy! I wear these all the time!
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable and way cuter on, in person. I have lots of friends rave about them and gave in to get my own pair. I should have bought them sooner! I wore them all summer. I wore them to water parks, the beach, Hawaii, around town. They still look great! I have high arches so it's not easy to find shoes! For more style inspiration and affordable fashion connect with me on IG @love.ericamarie or fb as Erica’s Steals Deals & Finds.
customer_reviews.author: Erica's Deals, Steals, & Finds

customer_reviews.title: Cute--but sizing off
customer_reviews.text: I really loved these sandals--I bought them in the bronze in my normal size 9, which I also wear other crocs in a 9 as well--these were also very comfortable, a little narrow but I could have definitely walked in them without a problem- the problem was that I had about a WHOLE INCH of extra space in the front of the shoe that would have caused me to trip if I kept them-/plus it was very obvious that they were just TOO BIG-- so if you buy these shoes I would recommend sizing down! Thank you Amazon for offering FREE RETURNS-- it really is so easy to return and not have to be out extra $$
customer_reviews.author: Ann Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Easy With A Little Support
customer_reviews.text: I live in a beach town. I needed a sandal that let my feet breathe, gave me some support and was waterproof. This sandal met all my needs. I have re-ordered many times. I work on my feet so the support is important. I wear them almost everyday. Unfortunately, the hot weather wears them down but I get my money's worth each time. They go with pants and dresses. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to LOVE but .....
customer_reviews.text: I so wanted to LOVE this sandals because Crocs are already so comfortable. But I couldn't because after 30 minutes of wearing these shoes the back of my ankles was irritated from the rubber material sticking up that slid up and down while I walked. I am giving it 3 star because of the following: 1. True to size 2. Reasonable price 3. Cute
customer_reviews.author: RS Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Buy these Crocs right now
customer_reviews.text: These are THE MOST COMFORTABLE Crocs ever. I have an old pair of "Really Sexi Sandals" which I thought were pretty great...until I tried these. No blisters or uncomfortable rubbing and they're super cushiony in the heel. The only complaint is that they run a bit big. I'm normally an 8.5 - 9 and my feet were swimming in the 9's so I exchanged them for an 8 and they're perfect. Seriously, do your feet a favor and get a pair of these. Now.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little small
customer_reviews.text: I typically wear a size 9 or even a 9 1/2 - the recommendation was to order a 1/2 size down - so I ordered a 9. Initially they were extremely comfortable and easy to walk in - but by the end of my 3 mile walk one of my heels had a very large blister. I am now awaiting on my new order of size 10 - hoping they arrive prior to my trip or I am going to be very disappointed. Unfortunately I did not try the shoes prior to the return window - so now I own the shoes that leave blisters.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight with Major Support!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down my favorite sandles that I currently own. Who knew Crocs could be So Freaking CUTE!! When I used to hear the word "crocs" I would think of clunky, chunky, unappealing mushroom shoes. But these sandals changed my opinion of the brand forever! I've already purchased more crocs in different styles due to how much I loved these sandals. They are super comfortable, the sandle molds to your foot and is so lightweight it feels like you have nothing on your feet at all (but you can tell you have major support). I highly recommend these shoes for busy moms who are always running around after kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pedicures all summer!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and cute! I get compliments on them whenever I wear them. I can wear them to my business casual office with a blouse and some leggings for the summer, and also out in the yard working as they just rinse off. I am 7 months pregnant, so comfortable shoes are a necessity. They are really cute and I can wear them all day (pregnancy swelling happens anyway, I just keep my feet elevated). I would recommend these to everyone. Just make sure you have a pedicure!
customer_reviews.author: PA21

customer_reviews.title: If you are between sizes, order down. I wear a 7 1/2, 7 fit perfect.
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable sandals ever. The "bronze" color looks like a 'nude', & it's going to literally go with every single outfit I have through summer. Perfect to pack; weigh nothing, and soap and water to clean. No worries if you walk through water either: they aren't going to separate or fall apart. LOVE THIS PURCHASE, worth every penny. No one will suspect you are wearing a pair of very comfy, but much maligned 'ugly Crocs' either.
customer_reviews.author: Mick

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I have to be honest, I am not a fan of the traditional Crocs, but after hearing about these sandals over and over, and reading the reviews, I decided to give them a try. Hey, I could always return them. Well, I finally got them and absolutely love them. They are so comfortable, and unlike your traditional sandals, the heel has excellent cushion. I am now looking into purchasing different colors. They have totally changed my opinion of Crocs.
customer_reviews.author: M. C. Martine

customer_reviews.title: most comfortable sandals!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals so much, this is my 2nd pair of black ones and I have the tan ones. I'm normally a size 9 but the 8s fit a little better... until I took them to the beach. They seemed to have slightly shrunk that day so those are now my camping sandals. I reordered 9s and they're fine. I can walk for miles in these!!
customer_reviews.author: Szile

customer_reviews.title: Love these! So comfy!! Fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love!! I read tons of reviews and was nervous to order, but so glad I did. They are as comfortable as other Crocs, but look cute! I was worried about sizing as I am a 7-71/2, but the 7 fits perfectly and an 8 would have been huge. Hope that helps others who are a half size. Highly recommend these if you're on the fence. Only concern I have is that I could see how they could potentially break where the straps connect. I really hope they hold up because they look fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: My third pair!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite everyday shoes! This is my third pair of these shoes. They are durable and last a long time... I buy 1 pair a year and wear them almost every day. I have wide feet so finding a sandal that is comfortable and still cute is hard. I could walk all day in these... in fact I call them my “theme park” shoes because they are the only shoes I will wear for a trip to Disney.
customer_reviews.author: Varina

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but way too narrow.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for an upcoming trip to Europe, as I'm looking for a stylish but very comfortable shoe. I really wanted to love these, because they are super comfortable. However, they just didn't look flattering. I don't wear wide shoes, but the soles of these are cut so narrow, that the edge of my feet appeared to hang off. It looked rather strange. I was also a little concerned that because they have a thicker sole, that one wrong step and my foot wold slip off or roll, since there's nothing to really hold your toes in place and they were already beyond the edge.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon W.

customer_reviews.title: not heavy and very comfortable. Also
customer_reviews.text: The sandal is light, not heavy and very comfortable. Also, very pretty and simple. Great fit. Received them today, so I just put them on and walked with them for abt 15 mins in the house. Will update if necessary once I have used them more. UPDATE: wore sandal for a full day. Comfortable on the foot but after a couple of hours, the toe strap started hurting. Became a bit uncomfortable, wearable but uncomfortable. Because of that changing rating from 5 to 4.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia E Perez

customer_reviews.title: Ouch!
customer_reviews.text: If you don’t have an absolute perfect fit, the toe straps kind of feel like razors between your toes! I’m a 6.5 but the 6 was on lightening deal so I got that one. Could barely walk in and out of store with them and passed them on to my niece with a little smaller foot. Not sure her full opinion on them but I’d recommend ordering up a size! Quality seems very good and they are cute, but not the best Crocs shoe I’ve tried!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Johnston

customer_reviews.title: These saved the day on a rocky beach
customer_reviews.text: I was planning a trip to Croatia where they're known for very rocky, very painful beaches. Everything I read had said that you should wear footwear on the beach. I looked around everywhere and found these in the nude/beige color and they were perfect! They stayed on my feet and protected them. They also have more support than your average sandal and are minimalist which I love. I'm officially a fan and will be wearing these long after the beaches of Croatia!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie_80

customer_reviews.title: I got these because they looked comfortable, convenient and cute
customer_reviews.text: I got these because they looked comfortable, convenient and cute! I have worn them daily through my entire pregnancy and they have been wonderful! So comfy and I can wear them all day without my feet hurting. And if my feet happen to swell...they will still fit great! So easy to slip on without having to bend over. ( bending over is a chore when you're pregnant) Love the bronze color, it's a neutral shade that goes with everything. I also love that it covers the heel because I have trouble with dry/cracked heels so these conceal that problem area. Can't get over how cushy these shoes are and how comfy they feel. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Panda

customer_reviews.title: SO comfy!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these! These are basically my favorite summer shoe ever. They are incredibly comfortable and they provide so much traction, which is perfect for those summer rain storms! I love walking for hours and these are so comfortable, you won't even notice the miles slipping away. I've even gotten my coworkers sold on these shoes! I typically wear an 8.5 but the 8 fits perfectly for the sandals! (If you go for a closed shoe, you may need to bump up a size but the sandals have a bit more leeway in my opinion.) The only thing I don't like is that they don't have this sandal in more colors, because I would buy ALL of them.
customer_reviews.author: Cee Dee

customer_reviews.title: What a Croc
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised these sandals got so many 4 and 5 star reviews! I needed a sandal that would stand up to getting wet and my foot would't slosh around in so I thought I would give these Crocs a try. First impression out of the box: CHEAP. These looked to me more like $10 sandals than the $30 I paid for them. The fit was true to size but they were not comfortable. I honestly didn't wear them a whole lot because I knew I would probably return them (which I did). This is my first and probably last Crocs purchase.
customer_reviews.author: thehabes

customer_reviews.title: Magic
customer_reviews.text: I wear these every single day. I can't tolerate any other shoe now apparently. This is the most comfortable shoe/sandal I have ever owned. They do make a sound when you walk which is noticeable if you are trying to sneak around In a quiet office without anyone seeing you and trying to chat you up.
customer_reviews.author: elena

customer_reviews.title: Great style and looks but very narrow and quality is lacking
customer_reviews.text: Got these today. Love the style and color. I have 2 other pairs of Croc sandals, 2 different styles. They were size 8s and fit perfectly. These Isabellas are much narrower, and my little toes hang off. They are comfortable, but the materials they are made of seem to be of less quality, as compared to the other 2 pair. I won't return them, because I love the style, but I won't pay what they cost anymore just to get poor quality. Somewhat disappointed, and wish I had seen them in a store before buying.
customer_reviews.author: slickCathy86

customer_reviews.title: Walking on cloud 9!
customer_reviews.text: I just got these sandals delivered today and I am IN LOVE!! I have plantar fasciitis and it's so hard to find good, comfortable, affordable sandals/shoes. I put these babies on today and OMG. My feet feel oh so good! My heels didn't hurt at all while I wore them, I didn't want to take them off! I usually wear a size 9.5/10 and I had read reviews saying that crocs tend to run a size larger. I ordered the 9 and they fit perfectly! I will definitwly be ordering more! Crocs, I'm sold. (Though NOT on the original crocs!)
customer_reviews.author: Adriane

customer_reviews.title: Best Sandals I've Ever Owned
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite sandals. I was skeptical of croc sandals but I can't go back to any others once I started wearing these. They're so comfortable. I walk 3-5 miles every day in them, I have high arches and often struggle with aching feet from poor shoe support and my feet don't hurt at all in these babies. This is my second pair - I had the others for 4 or 5 years and they still looked great from the top but I literally wore holes in the soles from how much I walked in them.
customer_reviews.author: Jan B

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy, but...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these because they looked comfy and pretty cute. While the fit is good, the back of the sandal rubs into your ankle (at least it did for me) and it’s super painful. I got blisters on both ankles, even after I “broke them in”. Had I gone up a size, they would’ve been too big. Such a bummer because they give a lot of support and are comfy otherwise. But not into the bloody blisters :(.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Petrilli

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my girlfriend for a beach vacation, but she only wore them once...she said that yes, they were the correct size, but the rubber (or plastic or whatever) was VERY uncomfortable, and the part that went between her toes pulled very strangely and was actually painful. She has lots of different thong type sandals, so it was this style of shoe in particular. I can't recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Will Farlow

customer_reviews.title: Love this style!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this sandal! Makes my feet feel pretty! I have the pearl white one as well! So versatile!! I can wear it for a more formal look with a skirt or dress, or casual, with capris and shorts. Very comfy! Great foot support! I am a 7 and this fits me like it was made for my foot! Thanks, Crocs, and thanks, 6pm! Will get a lot of use out of this sandal! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Wish they had half sizes
customer_reviews.text: Just received these sandals and they are very cute and seem comfy. But I wear a size 7.5 shoe. After reading reviews here, I decided to go with the 7. It's a little too snug and I am worried that it may rub between my toes enough to make these uncomfortable for long walks. If I find that to be the case, I like them so much that I'll just order another pair in a size 8 and hope they won't be too big.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: My feet thank me
customer_reviews.text: I have these in black and bronze, and the bronze does look better in person. I was really hesitant on the bronze, but I loved the black so much and wanted something that would look better with browns and navy blues. I think it definitely fits the bill. It’s so nice to have some sandals that look pretty much like a simple flip-flop but has support and cushion. My pregnant feet thank me everyday! Now if I were say going to an amusement park open to close, I would still opt for tennis shoes. But for normal to busy days these are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jones

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect for my squatty little feet.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these sandals I normally wear and 8 in crocs how ever based on some of the other reviews I read I took their advice and ordered a size up and they fit perfectly. I have fat squatty little feet so finding sandals like these that fit well is fantastic. I will say the little heel tab that sticks up in the back at the end of the day started to annoy my heel but honestly it was only at the end of the day and it did not leave a mark or anything. If you have a sensitive heel this may not work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Gina CentralTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: They're ok
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable but I think you do have to order a size up. Unfortunately they didn't have a bigger size for me. I ordered a size six (which is usually what I wear) and it fits a little tighter than it should. The plastic on the top actually rubbed my foot and made it look like a bruise. I wouldn't recommend to wear all day; maybe if I would've ordered a size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Qurnayn

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite sandals! They are very comfortable. I normally wear a 7.5, but in these I went down to a 7. I wanted to go smaller so my feet wouldn't slip around. They were a little snug at first, but I broke them in the first day I wore them and they feel perfect now. I normally have a lot of pain in my heels if I'm on my feet too long and these sandals prevent that. Will be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Abbey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for some style and comfort of Crocs
customer_reviews.text: After I broke them in (3rd wear really gave me blisters on backs of my feet and inner big toe), these shoes have been amazing for teaching, walks, and any time you want a sandal but the comfort of a squishy Croc. I had to return my 8s since I wasn't sure which to get, since there are no 1/2 sizes. I was able to easily return the 8 and get my 7. The 7s fit me perfectly, though I am true and true a 7.5/8 in other shoes. Very easy and fast shipping/returning.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Tate

customer_reviews.title: Love 'em.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair in this color. I liked the first pair so much that I decided to grab another pair before they discontinue the style. The gold'ish color is tame and neutral enough to wear with almost everything. They are the most comfortable style of Croc's that I've ever worn. I normally wear a size 6 shoe and that's what I bought. They fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Black

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable & Foot Flattering Sandals!!
customer_reviews.text: I just love these sandals. They are soo comfortable and flatters the feet. You can dress them up with a long flowing summer dress/skirt or casual with a pair of tights. The colour and style make them very versatile. The only concern I had was how slippery the sole felt on first wearing them on my tiled floors but after wearing them outside the house and then coming back in, the first-time smoothness wore off. So thumbs up on these!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebs

customer_reviews.title: Sooo cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Crazy comfortable with the classic crocs marshmallow sole and oh-so-cute! Bronze goes with EVERYTHING. I usually wear a 7.5 in casual shoes, 8 in heels. I got a 7 here. There's a little room to spare. So, for anyone between sizes, I'd say round down. My feet are on the wide side, the width here is perfect for me. No regrets, I wear them almost every day!
customer_reviews.author: chicken26

customer_reviews.title: Broke Again!
customer_reviews.text: These fit well and I like the color. The first time I put these sandals on, the back "T" separated from the two straps going to it. They were immediately replaced - Thank you. I wear theme occasionally - and am always careful about where I have to pull them over my heel where the first ones broke. However, it is now just under a year and one of the straps has again broken at the same location. I am wondering if it is a design flaw? I have other Crocs I have had for Years, wear them frequently, and have not had any problems with them.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie E

customer_reviews.title: I am a Croc convert!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best summer sandals I've ever owned. First of all, they're so cute. They are super easy to put on and take off, and wearing them is like wearing nothing, except that your feet are cushioned and never feel the ground they're walking on. You can't feel the straps at all. They don't rub or chafe in the least. I wore them to an all-day amusement park outing and my feet felt totally fine, and so did my back. They have great support. I would buy them in every color if I could.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hagerty

customer_reviews.title: Nice sandals but wrong size shipped
customer_reviews.text: I have a few of these croc sandals and they are the best for bad feet. The seller messed up though. I ordered a 10 M and they sent me a 10W and hadn't realized it until I ran out the house for an event and had no choice but to walk in the them the entire day.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: Super soft & lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of Crocs sandals and I absolutely love them. I’ve been a diehard Teva fan for years, but these give my Tevas some serious competition. As far as sizing goes, I vary from a 9-10 depending on the shoes. I decided to try a 9 in these and they are perfect. Although I will say if you have really wide feet they might hang off the sides a bit. But definitely worth trying! I ordered my first pair a couple weeks ago and I just ordered my second pair today in another color.
customer_reviews.author: npay222

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for theme parks in FL.
customer_reviews.text: I recently took a trip to NYC and wore these 4/5 days. They offered better support for heel, ball and arch than the Sam Edelman ballet flats I bought. They take about 3 good wears to really mold to the shape of your foot and feel a bit strange until then. The -1 star is because the thong can be irritating between your toes after long periods of time- but I'm talking 10+ miles and even still,the support for the rest of my feet was ideal. I would definitely buy them again, even if they don't decide to wrap the thong or make it with a different material. Definitely a good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Great even for high arches
customer_reviews.text: My high arches are tough to buy for and rarely do I find a shoe that checks all the boxes....And I never buy shoes online. I took a risk ordering these based on reviews and because they had a lightening deal on them. I LOVE THESE! They are extremely comfortable and lightweight yet provide enough support for my arches. I can wear them all day. I plan to buy a second pair!
customer_reviews.author: ksully

customer_reviews.title: Comfort of crocs but cute
customer_reviews.text: Like the design and very comfortable. Did leave a bit of a blister after the first long walk in them but After that, hasn’t been a problem
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Worthy of All Your Pennies!
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfy the moment you slip them on. Wore them all day with no low or mid back pain. No need to break in they fit immediately with no blisters. If it feels to small go up a size. I wear a 8 1/2 and got a nine and they fit perfect. The size 8's were to tight in the toe piece. I got these as dress up sandals to wear at work and no one can tell that they are crocs. These are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Katy Lambert

customer_reviews.title: So incredibly disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I'm so incredibly disappointed with these. I got them and loved them, as I've never been able to wear sandals that fit around the ankle because mine have always been bigger than average. Unfortunately, today they broke. :( While I was driving... I don't even think my foot was moving, and of course just outside the return window. I haven't even had them for two months. So sad.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I love this cute little sandals. They are comfortable, but I didn’t wear them for a long time. I have narrow feet and it fit just right. Like my whole foot fits on it, but it’s to the edge. Going up a size probably would be fine, but my true size works as well. I wear a 7.5 in women I ordered an 8.0.
customer_reviews.author: Becks

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC! I wear a size 11 and purchased that ...
customer_reviews.text: FANTASTIC! I wear a size 11 and purchased that in these shoes and they fit perfectly. I wear these on the weekends, to work, special events, etc. The first few times I wore the shoes, the plastic in the middle of my toes irritated me a bit but after I wore them in, they are perfect. I am going to Europe for a few weeks this summer for work and plan to wear these the whole time. They are so comfortable to walk in, look nice for business casual, and are durable.
customer_reviews.author: aburk

customer_reviews.title: Bad heels wrap will scrape
customer_reviews.text: The color and look is ok until you have to walk long distances in those sandals. They scraped both my heels and took a week to heal. It is terrible. I don’t think a size smaller or bigger will make much of a difference due to the design. The heel is attached to the bottom of the sole so it will scrape you no matter what.
customer_reviews.author: violacrazy

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow, unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel of these sand as ls and I needed them to work. I ordered a 7 after measuring my foot and that was far too small so I returned them and ordered an 8 which is my normal size. I swear the 8 and the 7 were the same. Far too narrow! If you have abnormally narrow feet you will love these sandals!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Ultra comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fit of these is amazing. I do have to kind of wiggle my foot to get it in, these are not a slip on shoe. The reason for this though is that once they’re on they are incredibly comfortable. More comfortable than a pair of Börn sandals I bought at the same time. Only reason they didn’t get 5 stars is that they are kind of plastic looking (of course they are basically plastic but sometimes crocs pulls off a shoe that’s more leather/cloth in appearance). These ran very true to size for me.
customer_reviews.author: theTreesandme

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sandals ever....
customer_reviews.text: I have the Isabella T strap in gold and now in black. I don’t think there was a day over the last summer that I didn’t wear the gold pair. I have two active toddlers. I wanted a pair of shoes that could be amphibious, somewhat dressy, just fine for every day and not break the bank. This sandal is perfect. And the black pair were on my list for Christmas. I’m not a Summer person but I can’t wait to wear these. They are the most comfortable sandal I’ve owned. Love them... I have to get more colors!
customer_reviews.author: K. Schaub

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, comfortable, durable, practical, and cute!
customer_reviews.text: I got these on a whim because I wanted a waterproof sandal that was comfortable and fit securely, and I can’t say enough good things about them. They’re amazingly comfortable, they look nice enough that I can get away with wearing them to work, and they’ve held up beautifully after a couple months of extensive use. I got them in black, so they match everything, and they’re versatile enough that I can wear them for almost any occasion. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great sandal for the price
customer_reviews.text: Like the color. Was surprised to find it fits much looser than the sexi flip models. Almost too loose for my 8.5 foot (ordered 9 as that’s what is perfect in the sexi flip). Others say the sexi flip runs very tight though, and I find it perfect. I have normal size ankles and normal width feet. Recommend these sandals without hesitation!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Stone

customer_reviews.title: Ok - I LOVE these sandals
customer_reviews.text: Ok - I LOVE these sandals! They are PERFECT for summer. I get tons of compliments when I wear them & nobody can believe that they are crocs. They are nice enough to wear out casually, but also perfect for going to the lake or camping. Super comfortable & easy to clean off if they get dirty. Honestly, these are perfect. I can't say enough good things about them. I have had them now for about 2 summers and they are still holding together well.
customer_reviews.author: NMargo

customer_reviews.title: Extremely COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as alternatives to my regular sandals as my feet have been swelling and in pain due to pregnancy. These have not only lessened swelling on most days, but they have provided much greater arch support than my typical shoes. I am grateful I found them and plan to buy them in a few more colors.
customer_reviews.author: NA Costa

customer_reviews.title: I love crocs.
customer_reviews.text: I do wish there were between sizes; I'm a 6 and 1/2 and the 6 is a bit snug. I love crocs.. this pair is cute and super comfortable. The design seems to hug your feet, relieving you of that slipping flip flop grief. The sole has additional structure and cushion which makes walking on hills, sand, rocks, etc. all much easier than an ordinary sandal. I even wear these hiking. I love a shoe you can just hose off if you need too. ;0
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Haag

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, comfortable, secure, weatherproof.
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandles. I live in Maui, Hawaii so they are perfect for the climate, dry or wet. The style is attractive and secure on the foot with the all around straps. They can be worn with almost any wardrobe here. I only wish that this style came in more colors.
customer_reviews.author: SharonC

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive sandals - mostly comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive, mostly comfortable, black sandal! As for me, I don't live in a locale where these can be worn that often, but in visiting warmer climes I've found I can wear them for hours. On some particularly hot days the connection next to the big toe becomes a bit uncomfortable by end of day. This may have to do with my toes not having a chance to fully get used to them. I do plan on giving a pair--in a different color--as gift to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Spring or Summer Sandal!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 8 first and had to send them back. The sandal was too narrow with a tight fit at the thong. Unfortunately crocs does not carry half sizes. So I then ordered a size 9. It is wider and has a looser fit at the thong. Which at first makes it feel like they are too big. However, I gave them a try and I love them! The bronze color is neutral so that it can be worn with everything. They have a look that can be versatile for dressy or casual. One other note: They are pretty comfortable for being a flat sandal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals! This is my second pair. The first lasted 4 years. They are comfortable enough to wear all day and walk a lot. They're also nicer looking than flip flops, so I wear them to work. They are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: cmich

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable, cute, with enough support!
customer_reviews.text: These are great sandals! I have several pair. I have had plantar fasciitis and these give enough support to keep it from coming back. I wear them all day long and have many compliments. Buy these sandals! I normally wear an 8 and I buy these in 7.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Crocs Women's Isabella T-Strap Sandal
product_meta.description: More feminine, more refined, more fun — the Crocs Isabella collection is a fresh take on the huarache. This style has barely-there straps, giving you a light and airy feeling, yet you still get the Crocs comfort you’re looking for with a Croslite foam footbed. Step into a breezy, summery state of mind every time you put them on.
feature_bullets: MORE REFINED, MORE FEMININE, MORE FUN: The Crocs Isabella sandals for women are a fresh take on the huarache Even with a minimal design and airy feel, you'll still get the same Crocs comfort
SLEEK STYLE: Inspired by warm weather and designed with personality, these flip-flops for women are feminine in shape and proportion with a streamlined T-strap style
PRACTICAL DESIGN: The soft translucent TPU sandal straps are designed with practicality The straps and uppers feel broken in from day one and are as comfortable as they are beautiful
ICONIC COMFORT: From everyday wear to date night, these T-strap women's sandals are flexible and made of Croslite material for Iconic Crocs Comfort Ankle strap mixes additional support with style
WOMEN'S FLIP-FLOP SANDALS: The Isabella women's flip-flops combine a minimal design with a sophisticated style that stands out The bright colors are sure to add a pop to any wardrobe
